00049 typedef struct opj_mqc_state {
00051         OPJ_UINT32 qeval;
00053         OPJ_UINT32 mps;
00055         struct opj_mqc_state *nmps;
00057         struct opj_mqc_state *nlps;
00058 } opj_mqc_state_t;

00060 #define MQC_NUMCTXS 19
00061 
00065 typedef struct opj_mqc {
00066         OPJ_UINT32 c;
00067         OPJ_UINT32 a;
00068         OPJ_UINT32 ct;
00069         OPJ_BYTE *bp;
00070         OPJ_BYTE *start;
00071         OPJ_BYTE *end;
00072         opj_mqc_state_t *ctxs[MQC_NUMCTXS];
00073         opj_mqc_state_t **curctx;
00074 #ifdef MQC_PERF_OPT
00075         unsigned char *buffer;
00076 #endif
00077 } opj_mqc_t;
